channel.title: Havin trouble with the compile
channel.description: ok im haveing trouble with the compile i got all the stuff i need for it like the java and everything and when i try to compile it says system cannot find the path specified doese any1 know what to do to fix it.

item.title: Havin trouble with the compile
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

kyle90:

ok thnx it says the error and note stuff again and says compiling finished so it should have the new ip address in it and do i need to compile the server for it to save?? and ill give u the client download and i can have some check to see if it works?

Okay, send it through pm or something.
&& That means it has compiled correctly.
&& You only need to compile the server if you’ve edited it, and you want the changes to show in-game. And I’m glad I could help I guess. But yeah, I’ll download client and test it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Havin trouble with the compile
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

Oh wait, it’s a client. Now put this.

@echo off :menu title Compiler echo Errors: if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit

That should work. Make sure you’ve erased everything before pasting that.

Read full topic

note: recompile with -xlint eprecation for details and note: misc.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations and note: recompile with -xlint:unchecked for details and the bottom says c:\users\kyle\desktop\elite pking client\files>pause

Read full topic

item.title: Havin trouble with the compile
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

Umm, this is the wrong section. But I will help anyway.

Right click on Compile.Bat, and click edit. Erase everything, and put this.

@echo off COLOR 09 title Compiler echo ------------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause cls

Depending on which version of JDK you have, switch out the ‘jdk1.6.0_20’ to the version you have installed. Unless this is the version you have, if so, just keep it like this.

And again, I know a Kyle Brewer that lives in morgan city. Would you happen to be her? Lol.

Read full topic
